item.title: Mattel has unveiled its latest line of Barbie dolls inspired by Greta Gerwig’s ‘BARBIE.’
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: Bella Ramsey on Pedro Pascal being called “daddy” by the internet: “I very much played into it at the beginning but now I’m worried it’s gone too far. I don’t know whether he’s still loving it; I need to ask him. He’s a global phenomenon as he should be, he’s pretty spectacular.”
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
‘THE LAST OF US’ season 2 will begin filming as soon as the end of this year.

item.title:
Bella Ramsey on season 2 of ‘THE LAST OF US’: “It’s darker. It’s really a story about revenge, and a continuation from the first season about the dangers of unconditional love.”
(https://vanityfair.com/hollywood/2023/05/bella-ramsey-hit-parade…)
